actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution in support of the President's actions to secure the release of the U.S. merchant vessel, the S.S.  Mayaguez, and its men.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President took the necessary action in the exercise of his constitutional powers within the framework of the War Powers Resolution to secure the release of the Mayaguez and its crew from the Cambodians. Supports the President decision and swift action.

titles.title: Resolution in support of the President's actions to secure the release of the U.S. merchant vessel, the S.S.  Mayaguez, and its men.
